variable.name: bcr_patient_barcode
variable.description: The unique identifier for an individual patient(public CDE id 2673794)

variable.name: days_to_drug_treatment_end
variable.description: Numeric value that represents the interval in days since the date of initial diagnosis and when pharmaceutical therapy ended

variable.name: days_to_drug_treatment_start
variable.description: Numeric value that represents the interval in days since the date of initial diagnosis and when pharmaceutical therapy started

variable.name: drug_category
variable.description: A grouping of agents that perform similar functions.(public CDE id 729)

variable.name: drug_name
variable.description: Text identification of the individual agent(s) used as part of a prior treatment regimen.(public CDE id 2975232)

variable.name: initial_course
variable.description: A text code or name to represent an access route for the administration of agents, evaluation of vital signs, etc.(public CDE id 2003586)

variable.name: number_cycles
variable.description: The total number of cycles administered to the patient.(public CDE id 62590)

variable.name: regimen_indication
variable.description: Text term to identify the reason for the administration of a treatment regimen. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2793511)

variable.name: route_of_administration
variable.description: A text code or name to represent an access route for the administration of agents or substances.(public CDE id 2003586)

variable.name: therapy_ongoing
variable.description: Text indicator to signify whether pharmaceutical therapy is ongoing.(public CDE id 3103479)

variable.name: total_dose
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the total cumulative dose administered to a patient.(public CDE id 1515)

variable.name: total_dose_units
variable.description: Code to represent the unit of measure (UOM) associated with a total dose for treatment.(public CDE id 3088785)
